channel.title: Help with server coding
channel.description:
Ok so i'm pretty new to coding an RSPS. I don't have a clue where to start, i'm not asking for you to write up some big guide i'd just like to know where to start. The main things i want to know is how to add an monster, how to add a command, how to add items to areas.
Thanks

item.title: Help with server coding
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

plus, theres just to much to tell him in a comment and idk about you i am not typing and entire tutorial in the comment

and i am sure no one else will

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server coding
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:7, topic:415632”][quote author=TheCyberMan link=topic=517551.msg3759704#msg3759704 date=1316758855]

theres tutorials on exactly what you are asking in the tutorial section

[/quote]Don’t just pointlessly post something from a quote. Post something useful or just don’t post.[/quote]I don’t see how it was pointless. It guides him in the direction he’s asking for.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server coding
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Well everything is contained in the client.java class. Just use ctrl + f and search your way around that huge file.

Read full topic
